body:
Comment 8: 
This might be helpful ...

I do not have any special settings on my computer. Instead, I have created gocmd.bat
batch file on my Desktop. The file has something like:

set GOROOT=c:\go
set GOPATH=c:\gopath
set PATH=%PATH%;c:\mingw\bin;%GOROOT%\bin
cd %GOROOT%\src
cmd

If I want to do some Go coding, I just double click on that file, and I have command
window with all environment setup as needed.

Alex
